thread.title: Black Stars goalkeepers' trainer Nassam Yakubu confirms talks with Hearts
thread.title_full: Black Stars goalkeepers' trainer Nassam Yakubu confirms talks with Hearts

title: Black Stars goalkeepers' trainer Nassam Yakubu confirms talks with Hearts
text:
Sports News | 23 October 2015 15:55 CET Black Stars goalkeepers' trainer Nassam Yakubu confirms talks with Hearts Nassam Yakubu (right) with Medeamaâ€™s Malik Akowuah 
Black Stars goalkeepers' trainer Nassam Yakubu has confirmed holding talks with Hearts over a potential move. 
Yakubu, who doubles as the goalkeepers' trainer of Medeama, is being courted to augment their technical bench ahead of the new season. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
